title: Bug fixes?
text: Not sure what bugs were fixed in the most recent update, but my email app hasnt worked right since. Need a new update.

title: Doesn’t work
text: Doesn’t want to open, I am trying to sign in but it doesn’t let me go of the page where you sign in. I’ve tried to delete it and re install it 3 times but it doesn’t work.

title: Best app Ever
text: ¡Gmail es mi héroe! Es tan fácil de usar que hasta mi abuela podría dominarlo. La bandeja de entrada organizada y el potente filtro de spam hacen que mi vida sea mucho más sencilla. Además, ¡la integración con otras aplicaciones que uso para trabajar como HubSpot, Drive y Calendar es una bendición! Con Gmail, la comunicación es fluida y eficiente. ¡No puedo imaginar mi vida digital sin él!

title: No way to report bug
text: You have a bug in the latest update for iOS. After you view an email, leave the app and then return, the screen shows only one message and no controls work, screen is frozen. You have to close the app and restart to read other messages.

title: Gmail reads your emails to show you ads
text: After years of using Gmail and other Google products I say enough. Can’t stand a company that misuses my data so much. They will serve you ads to the highest bidder. Your contacts, emails, searches - they use it all - hidden in the terms and conditions that no one reads. But what really broke the camels back is its…

title: Logged out
text: Gmail randomly logged me out, and now I can’t get back in because of a 2 step verification to a phone number I no longer have!!!!

title: Latest update breaks functionality
text: This latest update has broken the app’s functionality. If you click on a link in an email, it opens the email in full screen. It has not done this before. Then the back arrow in the upper left does not take you back to the normal screen with the list of emails on the left and the preview window on the right.

title: Mass amounts of unnecessary emails
text: Why can't you come up with a way to get rid of  years of emails but then again how would they make money! Yeah let us pay for more space 🤦🏻‍♀️ I can't even find my new emails

title: Información
text: Muy satisfecha

title: Suggested contacts can’t be turned off
text:
Developer replied to my review but they are confused. I already have the “save contact info when you interact” turned off. I’ve had that turned off for years. They’re not understanding the issue. The issue is the forced suggestions in the iOS app. I didn’t see anywhere to turn this off. This needs to be fixed. I’m currently using a different mail app until they change this. 

It’s showing me people I haven’t emailed in years, and Hide Suggestion does nothing. As well, there’s no way to turn the “feature” off.

title: No notification preview !!!???
text: What the heck, no more notification preview and iPhone and iPad mini. That is ridiculous. Devs please read and override you mgmt and put that back.

title: App. has limitations, it’s a waste of time!
text: The app on the App Store has many limitations. Cannot do this, cannot do that, you need a laptop for this feature to work etc etc. A waste of time app.

title: Notifications have bugs
text: Posting a one-star review here because Google has no support. All of my email notifications are now “you received a new message” notifications. Incredibly-annoying to get these, and it’s an obvious error that meeds a hot-fix.

title: Does what it needs to do.
text: Far better than using the junky Apple “Mail.”

title: I’m don’t like the new update
text: Usually I could see a glimpse of my received email on the notification tab but now when I get a new email, the notification just says “You have a new message” and I’m not able to see a glimpse of said message unless I go open the gmail app. I feel like this is a strategy to get me to spend more time in the gmail app and I don’t like it. This new update doesn’t help save time, so please revert to how it was. Also I checked the gmail app settings and there’s no option for “showing glimpse of new messages” so I know I’m not tripping, this is clearly intentional.

title: 好用及時

title: Una actualización…
text:
Me gustaría que hicieran una actualización cuando utilizo en “BUSCAR EN EL CORREO” uno en específico,  te ponga en primer lugar “RESULTADOS PRINCIPALES” eso no estaba anteriormente y para mí es algo molesto que aparezca ese primero, porque no dejar solamente “TODOS LOS RESULTADOS DEL CORREO ELECTRÓNICO” y ya, cuando buscas un correo específico.

O mínimo poderlo personalizar uno mismo si lo queremos así o no.
Porque yo lo quitaría.

title: Gmail
text: I got a message about being close to 15 gig. However no matter what I delete google does not clear the space allowed and therefore my data continues to grow instead of shrink. Very disappointing and frustrating. I dint want to change email account t but if Google dies t clean up the allowed space I may have to. Very annoying

title: Absolutely terrible
text: Unreliable, unresponsive. Constantly crashes and refuses to open. Terrible app. Completely unusable. I’ve tried uninstalling and reinstalling multiple times with the same results.

title: Flagged account
text: I created a google account because my other google account had a lot of scam mails and stuff like that and it was just a mess. So I created a new gmail and was changing my emails on all of my social media and etc. until it got deactivated because of suspicious activity or whatever. And now I can’t access some accounts that I switched too the new email and I sent an appeal and have to wait 2+ days now.

title: Unable to view Email preview from Notifications
text: Please bring back the feature of seeing the email preview in the notifications. “You have a message” as a notification for each email, without knowing the sender or its contents, serves no purpose. I am not sure why this has changed.

title: Desperately needs a text editor
text: It’s ok for an email app. But the only way I’ll leave outlook and use Gmail, is if they provide a text editor  so I can modify text appearance in outgoing emails.

title: Missing vital feature
text:
I like that I can put in my different accounts on here. However, one feature I could not find is how to select multiple emails t the same time to either Trash, archive, set to Spam/Junk. I rather set up my accounts through iOS’ mail app and manage it there. 
C’mon Google, get it together.

title: Broken notifications
text: I think my gmail updated and now I just get notifications that I got an email but I don’t see a preview of what the email says anymore. I have several gmail accounts and even when I tap the notification, it just takes me to the email inbox of whatever email I was last signed in on so then I have to hunt for which account the notification came from and whether it was an email or a chat since it’s the same notification. It’s very time consuming and annoying

title: Bug?
text:
I have always held over my gmail notification and previewed my email.
Now I press and hold the notification and it says “you have a new message” app is updated, I have the latest IOS and restarted my phone. I can’t stand it!

title: One small issue😐
text: Gmail is a really good app and it is very good to create a account in YT and a best way to create email, Everyone loves it and it’s way more than just a app, although this app is awesome, Everyone has one small issue, Yeah people have different issues, my issue is that a lot of my accounts has been deleted without even doing anything, And Phone number is always required which is the only thing I hate the most, It would be more than 5 star if it was fixed, Thank you and the team for making this app and making it on a great adventure to this amazing app, would be awesome if you guys would read the reviews

title: Cannot turn off preview
